description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

Mobile Money Wallet, Deposit, Send Money, Withdrawal, Mobile Topup and Payments.

Introducing the M-Selen App, with a smart look and exciting features that make your life simpler and easier. Register an M-Selen wallet and deposit money right from an M-Selen Agent in just a few minutes and get started. Recharge your mobile balance and send money to anyone in the Solomon Islands, all in a highly secure mobile money app. Get suggestions from M-Selen on what services you can explore next.

FAST M-SELEN WALLET REGISTRATION
Don't have an M-Selen wallet? Just visit your nearest M-Selen Agent or Our Telekom Phone Shops. After providing a valid ID and completing any other registration requirements, you can register a new M-Selen wallet in just a few minutes.

DEPOSIT MONEY FROM M-SELEN AGENT
Now that you have an M-Selen wallet, you need money in it, right? Just visit any nearest M-Selen Agent and the Agent will support you to make the deposit to your M-Selen wallet in exchange for cash.

SEND MONEY HOME OR TO ANYONE
Now that you have money in your M-Selen wallet and would like to send money home or to anyone, use the Send Money option in the M-Selen App to transfer money to any other M-Selen wallet or to anyone who doesn't have an M-Selen wallet but has a cell phone number.

MONEY WITHDRAWAL FROM M-SELEN AGENT
Use the Cash Withdrawal option in the M-Selen App to withdraw money from your M-Selen wallet at any M-Selen Agent point.

MOBILE TOP-UP
Top up your Our Telekom mobile phone balance very quickly and without visiting any Top-up agent using the Mobile Top-up option in the M-Selen App. You can do mobile Top-up for yourself or others using your M-Selen wallet.

HIGHLY SECURE MOBILE MONEY
We take the security of your M-Selen wallet very seriously. We send you an OTP to verify your M-Selen wallet during your first log-in. The M-Selen App also asks for your PIN during both login and transactions.

STATEMENT
Exert greater control over your M-Selen wallet by accessing your detailed transaction history.

ONE-TAP BALANCE CHECK
Checking your balance is just a tap away. We also help protect your data by hiding the balance after a few seconds.

GREATER TRANSPARENCY & CONTROL
Have greater visibility over your M-Selen transactions. While entering the amount, you will see your available balance, the auto-calculated service charge, and the special Tap & Hold button allows you a few seconds to check everything in the very last moment, all before completing the transaction.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Salaam Mobile Banking: Empowering Your Financial Journey

Welcome to Salaam Mobile Banking, your all-in-one financial app designed to make banking simple, secure, and accessible for everyone. Whether you're managing your daily expenses, saving for the future, or transferring money to loved ones, Salaam is here to help you every step of the way.

Premier Wallet is the first fully featured digital wallet in the country powered by Premier Bank. Premier Wallet helps you to shop, dine, pay bills and manage your digital cash on the go. From now onwards, you no longer have to worry about carrying cash nor struggle while exchanging money. Premier Wallet is an all-in-mobile smart wallet app that offers you real-time, online payment for your everyday shopping, online Bill Payment and money management.
 
Premier Wallet is the perfect replacement for physical money! It offers its users a convenient way to make money transactions online with ease and using only their smartphones.
 
You can pay for all your purchases using the mobile cash app. You can also pay bills online, transfer money online, and manage your Finances, Accounts and Cards on one platform. Using the payment app saves you time and eliminates the risk associated with losing physical money.

Furthermore, Premier Wallet offers you an easy, fast and secure way to manage payments in a fully featured digital wallet that is accessible via a simple and secure app adding ease and convenience to your day to day payments and financial transactions. Send, Receive, Request, Purchase and manage your spending directly from your phone and in one app. It is secure and anything cash can do, Premier Wallet does it better.

Premier Wallet provides a seamless registration process to all our customer and also non-customers. In order to get started, all you need is the following:
- Valid mobile number
- A selfie
- Valid ID
- Smart phone of your choice
 
Once you have these things set and ready you can begin your registration process by following the steps mentioned below.
Download the customer app and select new or Existing Premier Bank Customer
If Selected New, Select Gold or Standard account per your daily limit requirement.
Take Selfie
Scan the front and back of your ID
Enter and confirm your phone number.
Generate your secret password
Now it’s time your Premier Wallet to go beyond your physical wallet – Link your Wallet to your Premier Bank Account, add money using your Account, Card, ATM or any of our authorized agents. You can also ask your friend to send money using Premier Wallet. Isn’t it easy and astonishing!

Discover all the amazing things you can do through Premier Wallet!

Premier Wallet account

It’s a free wallet with zero maintenance charges.
No minimum balance required
Load cash in your wallet as per your requirement
Pay at the merchant’s outlet
Shop and pay at merchants’ outlets (restaurants, retail, electronics, groceries etc.) using QR code, or Merchant ID.
Check out our offer page for exciting deals and apply for discount promos while shopping and dining.

Shop online

Shop at merchants’ e-commerce website/mobile apps using Premier Wallet checkout and have it delivered to you at home without a hassle.

Utility payments

Pay your electricity, Tv and School Fees.

Send or receive money

Request or pay money from wallet to wallet by scanning the QR code or selecting contact name
Transfer money locally from wallet to Wallet and from Wallet to Bank Account and even to non-registered wallets.
Withdraw wallet cash at Premier Bank ATM with ease
International Remittance

Refer a friend to get rewarded.

Refer to as many friends as you want and earn for every successful invitation
Track and manage your spending on the go to save more.
 
We are always happy to hear from our customers!
For more details, feedback or ideas, you can reach us on any of the following platforms:
 
Web – www.Premierwallet.so
Email – help@Premierwallet.so
Facebook – www.facebook.com/Premier Wallet
Twitter – www.twitter.com/Premier Wallet
Instagram – www.instagram.com/Premier Wallet
Privacy policy – www.Premierwallet.so/privacy

BRED Solomon Connect offers the convenience of ‘Banking at your fingertips’ with an innovative online banking experience that is easier, faster and smarter than ever before.

The revamped and enhanced BRED Bank (Solomon) Limited mobile app makes it easy to bank on the go 24/7. Manage your everyday banking needs anywhere, anytime directly from your mobile / tablet device.
It is available to all BRED (Solomon) Limited customers.

Download today and enjoy the following convenience:

CHECK ACCOUNT BALANCE(S): Staying on top of your finance(s) has never been so easy. View up-to-date account balance(s) for your account(s).

CHECK YOUR LOAN(S): Avoid late payments by staying up-to-date with your loan(s) balance(s). BRED Vanuatu Connect provides the simplest glimpse of your loan details including repayment amount(s), payment due date(s) and much more. 

TRANSFER MONEY: Move money between your eligible account(s) at BRED or other account(s) at BRED or to another local or international bank from the comfort of your Smartphone / tablet. 

BILL PAYMENT: Pay your bills on-time with major registered billers in Vanuatu.
STATEMENT(S): View and download your account statement(s), bill payment history and transfer statement(s).

CHEQUE BOOK: Order your cheque book(s) on-the-go. 

REPORT A CLAIM: This app allows you to report any claim(s), problem(s), and feedback(s) or stop your lost card(s).

ATM & BRANCH LOCATOR: Find our ATMs and Branches by address and map.

To utilize this free service, you will need to complete a registration form at any BRED Bank Solomon branch to register for BRED Solomon Connect.

I’M A BRED CUSTOMER: If you are a BRED customer and already signed up for BRED Solomon Connect, please proceed and install this application.

I’M A BRED CUSTOMER BUT: If you are a BRED customer but have not signed up for BRED Solomon Connect, please visit your nearest BRED Bank Solomon branch and complete the registration processes.

WHAT YOU NEED TO REGISTER
•	Your BRED account details
•	Your current identification documents. Eg Passport, Driving License or National ID 
•	Your personal Smartphone
•	Your email address

FEES
There are no fees charged for new BRED Solomon Connect registration(s).

ONLINE GUARDIAN: Our commitment to security
Your security is our Top Priority! We take every precaution to ensure that your Mobile Banking transactions will be safe.*

*All information transmitted via BRED Solomon Connect is protected with highly secure encryption methods that mask sensitive information. A password or fingerprint authentication is required every time you log in on to BRED Solomon Connect.  

More features will be available in the next version.

TERMS & CONDITIONS APPLY.

This is the official authentication app developed by Xero Ltd. It's free to use, and Xero will never charge you for it.

At Xero, protecting your data is fundamental to everything we do. Just one easily guessed password can stop your business in its tracks. So Xero has put an extra deadbolt on the door to help keep your data secure.


This is why Xero uses MFA to secure logins. It significantly reduces the risk of someone gaining access to your account, even if they've managed to obtain your email and password through a phishing attack or malware.


The Xero Verify app is simple to use. You can receive push notifications for fast authentication, instead of having to open the app and enter a code into Xero when you login. Simply accept the notification on your device's home screen - it's that easy.


Features:

* Sign into your Xero account using push notifications on your device (if enabled).

* Generate six digit verification codes, even if you don't have a network or mobile connection.

* Use Xero Verify to authenticate your Xero account (it can't be used on other products outside Xero)

* Easy set up using QR code


Permission notice:

Camera: Needed to add accounts using QR codes

Push notifications: Accept to receive push notifications


Follow Xero on Twitter: https://twitter.com/xero/

Join the Xero Facebook Fan page: https://www.facebook.com/Xero.Accounting

Privacy policy: https://www.xero.com/about/legal/privacy/

Terms of use: https://www.xero.com/about/legal/terms/

Wallet is a market-leading personal finance manager, built to help you save money, plan for the future, and see all your finances in one place. See where your money goes by tracking expenses automatically with bank synchronization across all your accounts, currencies and investments. Dive into reports on your spending, manage debt, and track bills. Share specific features with loved ones to get on top of your budgets together.

Wallet allows you to see your finances your way: anywhere, any time.

Why People Love Wallet by BudgetBakers
“Helped me a lot with saving money. It's easy to use and user-friendly.” - Yasin Geddi
“Super!! Super Good app! Is stylish and easy to use! Definitely recommended for those who want to keep track of his expenses!” - Cedric Chevalier
“Superb for student expense, business and travelling or anything actually” - Jakob Baumgartner

Who Should Use Wallet
Tracking your spending just got a whole lot easier.  Toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real time. Wallet by BudgetBakers is not just an expense tracker or a budgeting app. It’s all about getting things under control now, so that you can make wise decisions and plan for the future - a month, a year, or 10 years down the line.

Wallet is designed to help you get your finances under control from day one, giving you ongoing insight into your financial situation, and helping you stay in control for the long term.

Premium Features:
Automatic Bank Updates - Transactions are automatically and securely synced with your bank and smartly categorized. With 4,000 participating banks worldwide, you’ll save loads of time not having to track every penny.
Unlimited accounts - Create as many accounts as you like. Add your bank accounts, vouchers, club cards, money in your pocket and track your expenses based on each account.
Insightful reports - Easy-to-understand graphs and financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across bank accounts, credit and debit cards, debts, and cash.
Stock Tracking -  track your stock portfolio right in the app! Monitor the value of your stocks and  combine your holdings with other accounts and assets for an overview of your net worth.  Grow your wealth by building a diversified portfolio of stocks, ETFs and other funds.
Flexible Budgeting - set one-time or recurring budgets, combining any category you want, and monitor your results on a daily basis.


LIST OF OTHER FEATURES:
● Beautiful, clean & elegant design
● Detailed charts and reports
● Cloud synchronisation across all your devices and web interface
● Multiple currencies support
● Advanced record tracking
● Easy filtering and creating categories and templates
● Personalised category icons
● Full range of payment types
● Creating your own income/expense subcategories
Visit our Terms of Service and Privacy policy at: https://budgetbakers.com/terms/

HOW TO START USING WALLET
1. Download the app
2. Sign In Via Facebook or Email
3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a master!
Wallet is certified with eTrust

There’s nothing more beautiful than a team you can bank on.
For #BankingMadeBeautiful, you can bank on us.
  
Switch to the fastest-growing bank in the Philippines. All you need is a Philippine mobile number, home address, and valid ID. Open an account in less than 5 minutes to enjoy simple, sustainable, and secure savings, shopping rewards, and the lowest bank transfer fee.

Bank on rewards points any way you pay.
Earn 1 point for every P100 spent in partner stores with your FREE Visa debit card, and 1 point for every P500 spend everywhere else (in-store, online or abroad). Then use those points to buy load or data, or pay for fees in the app, or even redeem it as cash you can either spend or save.

Bank on FREE transfers.
Use your Go Rewards points to cover the P8.00 InstaPay transfer fee (8 Go Rewards points = 1 free transfer).

Bank on convenient Mobile Check Deposits.
Deposit big amounts anytime up to P499,999.99 safely and conveniently by taking a photo of your check on the GoTyme Bank app. No deposit fees. Standard check clearing times apply.
  
Bank on simplified saving.
Open up to 5 savings accounts and earn high interest (vs traditional banks) with no minimum balance, no deposit caps. No missions, no limits. Stay on track with your goals using smart saving tools and reminders.

Speak to a helpful human for account-related help.
Contact us via any of our help channels: Chat with us in the GoTyme Bank app, call #GO8888 (#46888), or email help@gotyme.com.ph.

Secure your account through the following safety tips:
1. Use your own device to open an account.
2. Only install banking apps from official app stores.
3. Update your card PIN and passcode every 3 months.
4. Never share your OTP, PIN, or passcode with anyone. GoTyme Bank will never ask you for these.
5. Lock your card immediately in case of loss or theft.
6. Follow us for updates @gotymebank on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and TikTok.

GoTyme Bank is regulated by the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas. Deposits are insured by PDIC up to P1 Million per depositor.

Mobile Banking

you’ve got your Bank with you where ever you go. It’s ideal for banking on your Smart phone wherever you are in the world. It’s simple and saves time.

TAX SAVINGS SEASON:
Still, figuring out ways to reduce your income tax for this financial year? Don’t know where to invest in order to maximize your income tax savings?

Download the Policybazaar app now to:
1. Save up to Rs. 23,400 income tax by purchasing Health Insurance for you and your parents
2. Save up to Rs. 46,800 tax investing in ULIP Plans or by purchasing a Term Insurance plan

INTRODUCTION:
Policybazaar is India’s largest insurance comparison app. You can simply compare and buy from the widest range of insurance and investment products on the Policybazaar app. To experience all the features and purchase a product on the Policybazaar app you need to be either: 

A resident Indian;
A Non-Resident Indian;
Or a Person of Indian Origin

PRODUCT OFFERING:
With just a few clicks, the Policybazaar app allows you to purchase any of the following products: 

Life Insurance / Term Life Insurance / Term Insurance
Medical Insurance / Health Insurance 
Car Insurance / Motor Insurance
Two-wheeler or motorcycle Insurance
Travel Insurance
Investment Plans - ULIP, Child, Retirement, Pension & Tax Saving Plans
Home Insurance
Loss of Job and Income Insurance

KEY FEATURES:
With the Policybazaar app, you get access to essential features like Hospital Locator and Cashless Garage Locator. The other pioneering features of the app are: 

Compare: This feature helps understand the various features of every product so that you make an informed decision before you buy it. To compare, just shortlist the products that fit your budget and click compare.
Manage: Using this you can easily Buy, Store and Share all your products online with a single click.
Shortlist: You can view all your shortlisted insurance products by clicking on this button.
Profile: The dedicated Profile button on the app gives you access to your policy purchase history, your family members & vehicle information along with information of your other assets.
Claim Assistance: Whether you want to buy a product or need help with your existing purchases, the claim assistance feature will provide you hassle-free customer experience.
Insta Renew: This feature allows you to instantly renew your existing motor insurance policy with a single click.

OUR PARTNERS:
We have partnered with most of the leading insurers for your financial freedom.

For more details, please visit our website at https://www.policybazaar.com or call our Toll-Free number 1800-208-8787. You can also drop us an email at policybazaarmobileteam@gmail.com, in case you need any assistance or have any queries regarding any of our products. We are happy to help you.

"GCB Mobile App is your choicest banking app in Ghana. It offers you a complete financial solution that lets you do everything from opening an account to investing in Term Deposits, all from your smartphone or tablet without visiting any branch. With GCB Mobile App, you can:
•  Secure your profile with your fingerprint or face ID

GCB Mobile App is safe, secure and easy to use. Download it today and enjoy the experience."

LDB Trust - Mobile Banking and Digital Wallet at your fingertip.
Now comes with a brand new design, easier to use than ever with more banking functionalities combining the security and reliability from LDB Trust with the ease of use and speed of LDB Wallet into a single app.

- No need to have LDB Account or Card, just register to get your Wallet
- Transfer to LDB and other banks via LAPNET with the Account number or Card number
- Bill Payment - Mobile Top-Up, Electricity bill, Water bill, Lao Social Security, Leasing, and many more
- Statement/History - Keep track of your money at any time.
Instantly block and unblock your credit card anytime for your own safety
- Bookmark - Your favorite functions right on the first page
- Scan QR Code of both the LDB Trust and LDB Wallet for Transfer, Payment, Cash out with LDB Agency
- And many more
- The ‘small-b’ function in the app is designated for Waste Payment, allowing users to efficiently handle and complete payments related to waste management.

東日本旅客鉄道株式会社(JR東日本)が提供するSuicaをApple Payで利用するためのアプリです。Suicaの発行やチャージ、定期券の購入もアプリで完結します。スマホを「かざすだけ」で鉄道・バスの乗車やキャッシュレス決済をスムーズにご利用いただけます。「JRE POINT」に登録すれば、JR東日本の鉄道に乗るとポイントが貯まります。また、貯まったポイントをSuicaにチャージすることも可能です。

【Suicaアプリケーションでできること】
iPhone*とクレジットカードがあればSuicaアプリで簡単にキャッシュレス生活を始められます。お手元にSuicaカードがなくても、Suicaアプリにて新規発行することが可能です。Suicaカードをお持ちの場合は、iPhoneでApple Payに取り込んで利用できます。iPhoneとペアリングすることで、Apple Watch*でも利用可能です。

入会金、年会費、デポジット等はいただきません。
* iPhone 8以降のiPhone、Apple Watch Series 3以降のApple Watch、日本国内で発売されたiPhone 7及びApple Watch Series 2の機種が対象です。

決済手段は下記の2つが選べます。
・ Suicaアプリケーションに登録のクレジットカード*
・ Apple Payに設定したクレジットカード
　* ビューカードを登録いただくと「オートチャージ」も設定できます


■ 日本全国で使えます
・全国の鉄道・バスなどの交通機関*でご利用いただけます。
*Suica、PASMO、SAPICA、Kitaca、ICAS nimoca、icsca、りゅーと、TOICA、manaca、ICOCA、PiTaPa、SUGOCA、nimoca、はやかけん、OKICAの各エリア
・ICマークのある日本全国のお店やネットショッピングでのお支払いにもご利用いただけます。

■ Suicaへの入金（チャージ）、定期券、Suicaグリーン券、おトクなきっぷの購入もアプリで
Suicaアプリでは各種サービスを利用できます。
・ Suicaへの入金（チャージ）、オートチャージ設定
・ 電子マネー残高、利用履歴の確認
・ 定期券、Suicaグリーン券、おトクなきっぷの購入・払いもどし
・Suica定期券（カード）の取り込み
・ 領収書の印刷（会員向けウェブサイトにて）

【ご利用にあたって】
・ 困ったときにサポートを受けられるよう、モバイルSuica会員登録をお済ませください。
・ モバイルSuica会員は、紛失や端末故障時は会員向けウェブサイトから再発行登録（利用停止手続き）が可能です。
・ info@mobilesuica.comのメールを受信できるように設定してください。

◆ 重要なお知らせ ◆
【！】 端末を変更・交換する時は、以下の操作が必要です。
・ iPhoneは、旧端末のWalletで全てのSuicaを「削除」し、新端末で同じApple IDにサインイン後、Walletで「Suicaを追加」してください。
・ Apple Watchは、ペアリングを解除する前にiPhoneのWatch appまたはApple WatchのWalletで全てのSuicaを「削除」し、同じApple IDにサインインしているiPhoneと新端末をペアリング後、Watch appで「Suicaを追加」してください。
・Apple社製端末以外からの変更は、予め旧端末での手続きが必要です。iPhone/Apple WatchではSuicaを未設定のApple IDでサインインしお受け取りください。

【！】 端末の電源が切れた状態ではSuicaをご利用いただけません
　※鉄道のご利用中(改札内)に電源が切れた場合、ご利用区間の運賃等を現金でお支払いいただきます。

【！】 Suicaのエクスプレスカード設定を忘れずに
生体認証なしで自動改札を通るには「エクスプレスカード設定」が必要です。交通利用以外では生体認証が必要な場合があります。

【様々なアプリやサービスとの連携で、もっと便利に】
■ JRE POINT
「JRE POINT」にモバイルSuicaを登録することで、対象のJRE POINT加盟店やJR東日本の鉄道のご利用でポイントが貯まります。特に鉄道のご利用では、カードタイプのSuicaよりも多くポイントが貯まるのでおトクです。

■ タッチでGo!新幹線
Suicaアプリケーションで「タッチでGo!新幹線」のご利用登録が可能（Suicaカードの取り込みでも設定が引き継がれます）。チャージ残高で新幹線の自由席にご乗車いただけます（事前の予約は不要）。

■ 新幹線eチケットサービス
「えきねっと」に会員登録し、SuicaをICカード情報に登録すると、券売機やみどりの窓口できっぷを受け取ることなく、JR東日本の各新幹線をチケットレスでご利用いただけます。早めのお申込みでおトクな「えきねっとトクだ値」「お先にトクだ値」もご利用可能です。

■ エクスプレス予約
別途ご登録いただくことでとJR東海「エクスプレス予約」もご利用いただけます（有料サービス）。

ANZ Pacific App is our secure mobile banking app that puts your money at your fingertips. It’s now available for both personal and business customers, and you can use it anywhere – on the bus, at the beach, at home or in the office. 

Manage your everyday banking
• Move money between your accounts
• Send money to anyone with an ANZ bank account
• Send money to anyone in another local bank
• Send money overseas
• Pay bills from a list of ANZ registered billers
• Set up and manage scheduled payments
• View and download your account statements in PDF format
• Update your contact details
• Send a secure Bank Mail to ANZ

Manage your business
• Access your Personal and Business profiles on one device
• Send money to anyone locally or overseas
• Approve transactions submitted for authorisation
• Set up and manage scheduled payments
• View and download your account statements in PDF format
• Send a secure Bank Mail to ANZ

Your money and personal details are protected because:
• ANZ Pacific App is guarded by high-grade encryption and we ensure none of your personal or banking details are stored on your device.
• Security Questions provides a second level of authentication for registration.
• ANZ Pacific App locks you out if you repeatedly use the wrong security PIN, Security Questions or password, and will time-out if the app is left running for too long with no activity.

How to get set up:
Getting the ANZ Pacific App is easy. To get it, you’ll need to be registered for ANZ Internet Banking first.
You will also need an iPhone or iPad running on iOS version 12.5 (or above).

To use the ANZ Pacific App, you must have a valid ANZ Internet Banking User ID and Password.
• Open the ANZ Pacific App and select your country
• Enter your UserID and Password (please ensure you read, understand and accept the Terms and Conditions)
• Set up a new 4-digit PIN and re-enter it to confirm
• Once you've entered your PIN you'll need to complete the two security questions, when successful, you will be able to access the ANZ Pacific App.

Important information
The ANZ Pacific App is provided by the branch of Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Limited ABN 11 005 357 operating in the jurisdiction where your account(s) is opened and held.

By installing the ANZ Pacific App you acknowledge and accept the ANZ Pacific App Terms and Conditions and agree to receive those terms and conditions and any amendments to them electronically via your mobile device. You acknowledge that ANZ will not send you a paper copy, but you can get a copy below:

Cook Islands: https://www.anz.com/cookislands/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Fiji: https://www.anz.com/fiji/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Kiribati: https://www.anz.com/kiribati/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Samoa: https://www.anz.com/samoa/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Solomon Islands: https://www.anz.com/solomonislands/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Tonga: https://www.anz.com/tonga/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/ 
Vanuatu: https://www.anz.com/vanuatu/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/

EASY AND SIMPLE REGISTRATION

We are lowering the barrier of entry for individuals of any age and income bracket to start their investing journey. With just your NIN and contact details, you can join Bamboo and start trading with zero paperwork right from your mobile phone.


INSTANT TRADING

Whether you want to invest in companies you believe in and hold, or you wish to frequently liquidate your position to take advantage of the ups and downs of the market, you can begin realizing your dreams and profits.


SECURED TRADING

Bamboo protects you by ensuring all your trades and positions are insured by the SIPC and FINRA up to $500,000. You can freely buy and sell US stocks knowing that your money is safe.


UNPRECEDENTED ACCESS

Non-US citizens have had severely limited access and high barriers of entry to the US stock market. Bamboo is providing an incredible opportunity to invest in over 3,000 stocks, with a market capitalization of over 21 trillion USD.


FRACTIONAL INVESTING

You can start investing with as little as N15,000 in any company you desire. Our partnerships enable Bamboo users to own fractions of shares in different companies thereby giving users even more options to trade the stocks they desire.


EARN, EARN, EARN! 

The US stock market is one of the most exciting and definitely the largest stock exchange market in the world. With over 3.6 billion shares traded daily, there are infinite opportunities for you to make a fortune while buying or selling from a variety of stocks.


Disclosure: All investments involve risk and the past performance of a security or other financial product does not guarantee future results or returns. You can always lose money when you invest in securities or other financial products. Investors should consider their investment objectives and risks carefully before investing. Bamboo does not provide investment advice and individual investors should make their own decisions or seek independent advice. The value of investments can go up as well as down and you may receive back less than your original investment.

The new M-PESA App makes it easier to transact on M-PESA. 

The new app enables you to view your M-PESA balance in the home screen, Favorites lets you save your most frequently used features so that they're just a click away. Frequently used contacts and till numbers are automatically displayed so that you can quickly find them to send money or make payments.

·	Biometrics
Login to the myM-PESA app conveniently and authenticate payments by scanning your fingerprint or face ID.

·	Send money easily
Send money by scanning a QR code, searching your phonebook or selecting from your frequent M-PESA contacts. You can also add contacts to your favorites list so you don't have to search every time.

·	Pay Bills
Pay your bills easier by selecting from the popular M-PESA bills, scanning a QR code or by selecting from one of your favorite or frequent bills

·	Buy Goods and services
Pay for your goods and services by manually inserting the till number, scanning a QR code or by selecting one of your favorite and frequent used tills.

·	Pay to Phone Number
This is a new payment service that allows customers to pay small businesses for their goods and services

·	Withdraw
Withdraw money from your M-PESA at any agent or at selected bank ATMs

·	Buy Airtime
Buy airtime conveniently with M-PESA for yourself or for your family and friends

Wallet service
- SafariPay Corp. DBA PaySii has partnered with AVENU, a division of FDIC-insured MainStreet Bank, to offer the current customers the option of opening a digital bank account also known as PaySii Wallet. The customer, if approved, would have the option to use such a wallet to pay for its remittance/transaction, and/or make other (digital) payments to other compatible devices, granted there are funds available. These funds can be added to the wallet using debit or ACH mechanisms from the customers’ own bank account. The wallet will be under the control of Avenu.

- This product is only available in the continental United States to those of legal age that meet the requirements stated in the Terms of Condition.

- To a degree, some customers’ information (such as name, address, identifiable information, and other) will be shared with AVENU for our everyday business purposes such as to process your transactions and maintain your account(s). For any customer assistance or support, PaySii will be the primary point of contact, and if needed, the customer might be referred to the AVENU hotline.

Travel service
- Paysii has been linked to travel service that provides flight, hotel and other bundles booking for Paysii customers. The service is currently hosted at TaamTravel  and is owned and managed by AfroAtlas (afroatlas.com). AfroAtlas will manage the complete booking follow (reservation and payments). AfroAtlas uses separate payment processor for customer bookings. Once the customer clicks on the Travel link/button on the app/web, he/she will be redirected to the TaamTravel  booking site.

- The customer will be shown the following disclaimer message and will be given the option to be redirected to TaamTravel  or to stay in Paysii. 

- Disclaimer: You are now leaving PaySii and are going to a third-party website. PaySii makes no claims or warranty regarding the accuracy of the information contained in this site. If you have any questions or concerns about the products and services offered, please contact the third party directly. You are being redirected to: TaamTravel 

- No Paysii customers information (profile and payment) will be shared with AfroAtlas. AfroAtlas customer support information is published at the bottom of the travel site TaamTravel . If the customers contact Paysii support for travel related issues, we should forward them to AfroAtlas support.
